16oz Claw Premium Hammer

settings.editor:
This Claw Hammer is perfect for all your nailing and woodworking projects.

✔️ Magnetic Nail Slot: Grab nails without the hassle.

✔️ Comfortable Steel Handle: Easy to use for hours, no hand strain.

✔️ Tough Carbon Steel Head: Built to handle England’s weather and tough jobs.

At 450g, it’s the ideal weight for control and power.

settings.editor:
Product Features:

  • Head Weight: 450g (16oz) – Ideal for balance and control.

  • Handle: Steel tube handle for a solid, comfortable grip.

  • Head Material: Forged Carbon Steel – Built for strength and long-lasting use.

  • Surface Finish: Polished or powder-coated for extra durability.

  • Hardness: HRC 48-55, adjustable to your needs.

Additional Info:

  • Magnetic Nail Slot: Makes nailing faster and easier.

  • Comfortable Grip: Alloy steel handle ensures comfort during long use.

  • Perfect for All Projects: From home repairs to DIY woodworking, it’s made to handle all tasks.

Packaging & Delivery:

  • Package Size: 39X15X3 cm

  • Weight: 0.8 kg per hammer

We know you’re not here to waste time.

You need tools that deliver. Fast delivery, strong build, unbeatable comfort, and real performance.

These are answers to the most common questions from customers just like you.

items.item_title: What makes this hammer better than others?
What material is the hammer made of?
Does it come with a warranty?
Can I use it for demolition work?

settings.editor: Answer: You get pro-level performance without the premium price tag. Rugged materials, ergonomic design, fast delivery, and a satisfaction guarantee — all from a brand that listens to what workers actually need.

Answer: This hammer features a forged high-carbon steel head — the kind that doesn’t back down under pressure. It’s paired with a shock-absorbing handle to reduce vibration and protect your joints during long work sessions.
Answer: We don’t mess around with slow shipping. Order before the daily cutoff and you’ll get next-day delivery across England. Need it urgently? We’ve got you covered.

Answer: Every hammer is backed by our full satisfaction guarantee. If something goes wrong due to a defect, we’ll replace it or refund you — no questions asked. That’s how confident we are in our quality.

Answer: Yes — and it's more than that. The ergonomic, non-slip handle is designed to give you full control, even if your hands are wet or sweaty. It reduces fatigue and increases precision, so you can focus on the job, not your grip.

Answer: Yes, and it excels at it. With its solid build and balanced head, you can smash through drywall, rip up flooring, or dismantle structures without hesitation. It’s built for destruction when you need it — and finesse when you don’t 😊.

Leave Us a Review...
We’d Love to Hear From You

settings.editor:
Your feedback means the world to us. Whether you’ve used our Magnetic 16oz Claw Hammer for a quick home fix or a full-on renovation, we want to know how it went. Your reviews not only help us improve – they also help other customers choose the right tools for the job.

If you were happy with your purchase, let us (and others) know! A few kind words go a long way. And if there's anything we can do better, we’re all ears – we're committed to making sure every experience is a five-star one.

Drop us a quick review today
